permissions.copyright-statement: © 2013 by the American Association of Diabetes Educators

sec.title: Vote for Your 2014 Leaders
sec.p: Make your opinion count and cast a vote for AADE’s future leaders. Voting begins May 15 and continues through June 17. The following positions are included in this election. They begin their term in January 2014.
Board of Directors — Four positions, each to fill a 3-year term
Member Affiliates Liaison to the Board — One position, to fill a 2-year term
Nominating Committee — Four positions, each to fill a 1-year term
This is your chance to shape the future of AADE and vote for the people who best represent your professional interests.

sec.title: Advance Registration Discount Through June 14
sec.p: Join us in Philadelphia, August 7-10, for the AADE Annual Meeting and Exhibition, the premier event in diabetes self-management education. Diabetes educators from across the nation have the opportunity to network with one another, learn about the latest research and technologies, enhance their patient education skills, and reinvigorate their passion.

Educational tracks:
Pathophysiology, Epidemiology and Clinical Guidelines
Culturally-Competent Supportive Care Across the Lifespan
Teaching and Learning Skills
Self-Management Education
Program and Business Management
Register by June 14 to save $100 on your full program registration fee and save an additional $100 when you book your housing at the same time.

sec.title: Looking for an Opportunity to Volunteer?
sec.p: Volunteering offers countless professional and personal benefits. If you’re looking to get involved, AADE can help. We have a variety of opportunities that fit your busy schedule. Some of these include local leadership positions, reviewers of patient education materials, blog writing, and diabetes advocacy.

p.bold: How to Speak to Patients Using Technology
